ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - The Scorpius Run
ComicInfo.Summary: The Scorpius Run [Part 4]: The Enterprise is under the control of Aisla who uses the ship to attack the Karogie ship, while Pike and crew desperately attempt to regain control of the Enterprise. The Karogie attempt to destroy the Enterprise in return, and only Spock can stop their attack. Meanwhile, La'an and Una lead a team to repel invading Rovoks from the hull of the Enterprise.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 21:18:09. [CVDB1033456] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:09:18. [Issue ID 2587465]

Sam Kirk,Captain Christopher Pike,unnamed Starfleet officers,unnamed Karogies,Aisla,Lt. Jenna Mitchell,Lt. Erica Ortegas
ComicInfo.Title: The Scorpius Run [Part 4]
